programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan berbentuk nyanyian yang diselitkan dengan sketsa yang akan menghiburkan penonton di hujung minggu bersama dengan seorang penyanyi jemputan.

programme.title: Ragam Ep01
programme.desc: Kombinasi 5 sketsa pendek yang berlainan dan di lakonkan oleh artis artis yang berlainan. Setiap sketsa membawa tema, set up dan penceritaan yang berbeza mengenai ragam manusia.

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep25
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seekor kucing pemalas yang bernama Oggy. Dia suka menghabiskan hari-harinya dengan menonton televisyen dan makan. Tiga ekor lipas kecil, Joey, Marky dan Dee Dee suka menyerang peti sejuk Oggy

programme.title: Orang Ketiga S2 Ep56
programme.desc: Afifah, suri rumah hidup dalam kemewahan. Dia merasa hidupnya cukup sempurna, mempunyai seorang anak dan suami yang berkerjaya. Dia sering cemburu dan curiga pada perempuan muda, disekeliling suaminya.

programme.title: Diva Popular Ep18
programme.desc: Lola tidak tahu apa yang berlaku pada Ika. Wawa dan Syaazwan berusaha untuk menyelamatkan Ika. Erma marah kerana Syazwan masih ambil tahu tentang Ika.

programme.title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka Ep15
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Mauli dan Nandini. Suami Mauli, Kunal dan Nandini saling jatuh cinta. Nandini menjadi mangsa keganasan rumah tangga dia sering dipukul oleh suaminya Rajdeep.

programme.title: Hari Kita Jatuh Cinta Ep15
programme.desc: Rahsia demi rahsia mula terbongkar. Hubungan Farhan dan Mariam kembali buruk.

programme.title: Gila Gila Remaja
programme.desc: Roy seorang remaja yang sering menimbulkan kekacauan, jatuh cinta dengan Suziana, seorang gadis yang menjadi rebutan ramai terutama sekali Farouk.

programme.title: Our World Ep191

programme.desc: Two master jewel thieves are set on the same target, but sparks fly between them when they first meet and they fall instantly in love, not knowing that they are rivals.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: If you liked House of 72 Tenants, you won't want to miss out on this humorous, fun-filled sequel complete with 10 more tenants!

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Adapted from Chiung Yao's novel, this romance depicts how a wealthy man and a sweet girl discover that they are soulmates too late in life.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: Two students fall in love but their two families are enemies and separated by a river that is filled with crocodiles and beasts.

programme.title: Hex After Hex
programme.desc: In this comedy, hellish emotions are unleashed when a demon arranges to have his true love killed in order to possess her. Starring Lo Meng.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: In this lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, two cardsharks spar in a battle of wits and fists to become king of the casino.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Hung Jen, struggling actor meets Hui Hsin, an associate producer who must write a script for a love story. He invites her out on a date as a research for her script and soon falls in love.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: This action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong's elite in the 1990s, perpetuated by billionaire & serial kidnapper Logan & his gang.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: While using a new invention, three friends wind up trapped in the 1993 film Flirting Scholar. Upon discovering that the lead character, Tang Pak Fu, is missing, the trio devises a plan.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When four employees decide to sign up for their company's new Dragon Boat team, a life-changing challenge waits up ahead.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: Based on the Mekong River massacre, Zhang Han Yu & Eddie Peng star as members of a task force bent on bringing down a drug cartel, with Malaysia providing the backdrops for breath-taking action scenes.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: Starring Gwei Lun Mei, Joseph Chang & Cheney Chen, this crime drama depicts how a young cop goes undercover to bring down a slick group of criminals specializing in mobile fraud.

programme.title: The Secret Diary of a Mom-To-Be
programme.desc: Carmen, who works at a PR company, has no intention of having children and is enjoying married life. Yet, what happens when she suddenly finds herself pregnant?

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A Royal Hong Kong police inspector (Jackie Chan) must pull himself up again after a bungled mission caused his entire team to be wiped out.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: An affluent young man decides to carry on his father's legacy by establishing the Mr McDreamy Training Academy with four suitable recruits - to hilarious results.

programme.desc: 2021 NCAA Men's Golf Championships: Team Match Play Semi Finals from Grayhawk Golf Club, Scottsdale, Arizona.

programme.desc: Korn Ferry Tour 2021 - BMW Charity Pro-Am from Thornblade Club, Greer, SC.

programme.desc: PGA Tour Champions 2021 - American Family Insurance Championship from University Ridge GC, Madison, WI.

programme.desc: Ladies PGA Tour 2021 - LPGA Mediheal Championship from Lake Merced Golf Club, Daly City, CA.

programme.title: PGA Tour - The Cut Ep192
programme.desc: Check out the latest happenings on the PGA Tour golf scene, including highlights of the season hottest tour, interviews and previews.

programme.title: Playing Lessons Ep412
programme.desc: Join the hottest players from the PGA, LPGA and European Tours for some golf, and discover the strategies and techniques that work for them on the big stage.

programme.title: Live From The US Open Ep361
programme.desc: Catch the latest happenings of the US Open from Torrey Pines (South), San Diego, CA, including previews, highlights and interviews.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Kate, who works as an elf at a year-round holiday shop, faces an endless streak of bad luck and poor decision-making until she meets Tom, a man with a mysterious past who challenges her cynical world view.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep914
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Spell
programme.desc: A man crash lands in Appalachia and awakens to find himself trapped by a traditional Hoodoo practitioner. To save his family, he must break free from her before the rise of the blood moon.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: After a plane crash a young therapist Claire is assigned by her mentor to counsel the flight's five survivors. Claire is intrigued by Eric the most secretive of the passengers.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: Two women on a fishing trip find themselves embarking on a crime spree across the American southwest after shooting an attempted rapist.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep914
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man discovers the meaning of true love while battling princes, ghosts and an evil witch in a quest to protect the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Artist Clare Abshire shares a deep emotional bond with Henry De Tamble, a handsome librarian who travels involuntarily through time.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan is spirited away to a magical land, where he finds both fun and dangers, and discovers his destiny to become the hero who will be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Lake House
programme.desc: A doctor and architect fall in love through letters and realise that they are living in the same house during different periods.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: the Road Chip
programme.desc: Believing that they will be abandoned by their human friend after he proposes to his girlfriend, the chipmunks have three days to stop the proposal.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: the Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridget Jones, a self-doubting, career-minded, calorie-counting singleton, has found romantic bliss and nothing could be better; or could it?

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke and Laurence Fishburne go head-to-head, as cops and criminals reluctantly unite to fight for their lives in this 1976 remake.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one wordTenetand fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: Six strangers who have gathered for a highly immersive escape room soon make the sickening discovery that they are pawns in a sadistic game of life and death.

programme.title: House Hunters S118 Ep04
programme.desc: Millennial buyers look for a vintage row house in Philadelphia.

programme.title: Flip or Flop S7 Ep13
